entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 02:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
